title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Worked with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and optimize full-stack features for an innovative resume-tailoring and job-board platform which helps many people during their job hunting process

title: Master of Computer Science
description: Driven by a deep passion for computer science, I made the life-changing decision to pursue my master’s degree in this field. In the vibrant city of Buffalo, I have grown not only in knowledge but also in spirit — expanding my horizons, embracing new challenges, and forming friendships that will last a lifetime.

title: Engineering Specialist
description: Working at this multinational manufacturing and robotics company, I helped design mechanical components for their products and automated parts of their workflow for inventory management, gaining valuable experience in an engineering environment.

title: Master of Mechanical Engineering
description: During my studies here, I was first introduced to the charm of programming while working on a CNN-based project for pipeline crack analysis. Since then, I’ve developed a strong interest in programming and began teaching myself in my spare time.

title: Bachelor of Engineering
description: University gave me a solid foundation in logical thinking and taught me how to solve problems under time constraints and pressure. It was also where I learned my first programming language, C.

title: Moving to Canada
description: In 2014, I started a new chapter of my life in Canada. The experience allowed me to embrace different cultures, learn a new language, and finally, I come to see the country as my second home.

title: Life in Lanzhou
description: I was born and raised in Lanzhou, a beautiful city in northwestern China known for the Yellow River and its delicious noodles. I still hold a deep love for this place.
